name: Doki.dark
description: Stylus users, please use the user.css version instead, which has run-time configurable colors. This is an unmaintained userstyle to darken doki.co using a black background and light blue text.
additional_info: Some unnecessary coding may have been done. Created for dark rooms/environments. This was truly created to meet my personal preferences and needs. You may use this as you like. If you don't like it, feel free to edit it. Changelog: 2013-11-14 - a complete rewrite. You may notice a much more compact and understandable style was used. You may wish to blacklist this style for doki's XDCC site, as that site comes with easily changeable skins. 2014-09-29 - Introducing css vars converting style to use variables for easier customizations/maintenance. Fixed hover on visited links.
